channel.title: Chaotics
channel.description:
Alright, I cannont decide what chaotic weapon to get. I'm currently 72 dungeon.
I have 60 atk/89 str/90 def/94 range.
I don't really want to have to train attack 20 levels to use a chaotic weapon.
So should I get the crossbow/attack weapon/shield/staff?

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @costanator24 costanator24
item.description:
@costanator24 wrote:

im going to have to agree with the majority here… rapier all the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:394640”]>Buying the worst hat in the game because it looks cool

Same reason

Also because for 200k tokens, I can get an arcane stream necklace, coal bag, tome of frost, and gem bag + more I think, which I’d much prefer. I don’t PvP or even PvM much except with magic… so…[/quote]
Unlike rares, the rapier at least has a use and doesn’t cost much at all.

Saying you aren’t really into combat probably would’ve been better though lol. There are some decent rewards you can get from dungeoneering that are skill-based, so I don’t blame you there.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Im not going to buy anything till 99 dung, then at 99 ill buy all the items you don’t need to charge, then as many rapiers as I can get for the tokens I have, and if im right, I can charge each for 2m after or for some tokens.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Buying the worst hat in the game because it looks cool

Same reason

Also because for 200k tokens, I can get an arcane stream necklace, coal bag, tome of frost, and gem bag + more I think, which I’d much prefer. I don’t PvP or even PvM much except with magic… so…

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t really care which is best, I think the rapier looks retarded and I would never buy it. But to be honest, if it was me, I probably wouldn’t buy any of the chaotic weapons until I had bought everything else (I prefer things I dont have to charge)

Not buying the best weapon in the game because I don’t like how it looks

Why…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I currently have 58 dung, and once i get 80, im going for the rapier, ive heard it was the best, generally.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

With your strength level, get the maul and you’ll rape in pvp.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:394640”]Alright, I cannont decide what chaotic weapon to get.
I’m currently 72 dungeon.

I have 60 atk/89 str/90 def/94 range.

I don’t really want to have to train attack 20 levels to use a chaotic weapon.

So should I get the crossbow/attack weapon/shield/staff?[/quote]

I’d go with rapier, even though 60 attack pures are cool. If you choose not to level attack, I’d go with crossbow.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:394640”][quote author=casey. link=topic=491826.msg3596640#msg3596640 date=1305157825]
Depends on what you like to do.

Rapier-General slayer and PVP
CLS-Boss, high def monsters
Everything else sucks
[/quote]
I’ve heard crossbow is decent for pvp ranging.

And the staff hits 15% harder, and the sheild is like 20% stronger against range or something.

And how many of you actually have chaotic? Other than casey.[/quote]

I’ve got the Maul and Rapier.

Maul is shit.
Go rapier.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Crossbow has high accuracy, shields can be useful, maul is nice, but I think you need 80 attack anyways. Rapier is still usually the best way to go.
